title: The Five Players We’re Most Intrigued by Post-Quarantine | The Mismatch
description:
A lot can change in an unprecedented, three-month interruption of the NBA season. After not seeing much of anything from players on social media since the NBA shut down, Chris and Kevin each list the three players they’re most excited to see when basketball returns.

Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor
